snippet: A week of performances at the Kennedy Center will include the Bolshoi’s prima, Svetlana Zakharova, dancing with David Hallberg, in his first American appearance since joining the Bolshoi.
abstract: A week of performances at the Kennedy Center will include the Bolshoi’s prima, Svetlana Zakharova, dancing with David Hallberg, in his first American appearance since joining the Bolshoi.

headline.main: Bolshoi Names Cast for First Part of American Tour
